Basically. Show by rock is about this High school girl who ends up in a world full of people with Animal ears and Tails that become Hello Kitty style people when they're performing music. (And everyone loves music)

This girl has to defeat these things called Dark monsters using the power of rock if she ever wants to get back to her world.
